title: Are there two versions of the song Emotinal Atyachar from Dev D? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song ‘Tera emotional Atyachar’ has two versions, one is the rock version and other is the bass version EMOSANAL ATTYACHAAR (ROCK Version) Emotional Attyachar | Dev D (2009) | Bonnie Chakraborty & Amit Trivedi | Abhay Deol | HD 1080p Song Amit Trivedi is an Indian music director, film score composer, singer and lyricist. Hhe is popular for songs like Namo Namo, Naina da kya Kasoor, Love You Zindagi, Sound of Nation, Udta Punjab. He has been music director for movies like Shaandaar, Fitoor, Kedarnath, Manmarziyan and many more Bonnie Chakraborty is an Indian playback singer. he was the lead vocalist of Kolkata based band Krosswindz until 1998. He has sung many songs in several languages including Hindi, Tamil and Bengali for various films. He is popular or his songs like Saamne Hai Savera, Nikal pado Re Bandhu, Hey Kaala Bandar. For the first time he has done music direction for the the movie The Pickup Artist.
